BlurEffect BlurModeParameter BrightnessGamma Applies the Brightness/Gamma values set in the user's preferences. BrightnessGammaRenderer Renderer for the Brightness/Gamma effect. LowColorDither Reduces the color depth and applies a dithering effect. LowColorDitherRender Renderer for the LowColorDither effect. LowerColorDepth Reduces the color depth of the image. LowerColorDepthRenderer Renderer for the LowerColorDepth effect. Outline Adds an outline effect with optional artistic jittering. OutlineRenderer Renderer for the Outline effect. Overlay Adds an overlay on top of the image. OverlayRenderer Renderer for the Overlay effect. Pixelate Pixelates the image. PixelateRender Renderer for the Pixelate effect. Underwater Applies underwater effects with fog and distortion. UnderwaterRenderer Renderer for the Underwater effect. VHSEffect Applies VHS style effects to the image. VHSEffectRenderer Renderer for the VHS effect. Enums BlurEffect.Mode BlurEffect.Pass Pixelate.Mode
